name: circular-alias
code: alias foo = bar; alias bar = foo;

name: circular-const
desc: a global const cannot have cycles
code: const foo: u32 = bar; const bar: u32 = foo;

name: circular-const-indirect
desc: a global const cannot reference itself

name: circular-alias-const
desc: cycle between an alias and a const
code: alias foo = array<u32, bar[0]>; const bar = array<foo, 1>(1u);

name: circular-var
desc: a global var cannot have cycles
code: var<private> foo = bar; const bar = foo;
